articles.title: Defense secretary Pete Hegseth designates Anthropic a supply chain risk
articles.description: Nearly two hours after President Donald Trump announced on Truth Social that he was banning Anthropic products from the federal government, Secretary of Defense Pete Hegseth took it one step further and announced that he was now designating the AI company as a "supply-chain risk," which Anthropic says it is willing to challenge in court. […]
articles.author: Tina Nguyen

articles.title: The best instant cameras you can buy right now
articles.description: Even with the ability to take excellent photos with our phones and instantly share them across the world, thereâ€™s something magical about the old-school instant camera. With just a click of a button, you can capture a moment in a photo that you can see and touch almost immediately. Images captured by an instant camera […]
articles.author: Sheena Vasani
